column4: Hay. dose any1 know how to get the touch screen working on a Fujitus siemens B-2131? I am using xubuntu but I'm not get a responce from them and it can't be much diffrent to ubuntu to set up can it?
is that a Stylistic model?
i will check. i know the Stylistic models use the "fpit" driver
still there?
have you found somthing?
evtouch, not fpit, for you. sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-input-evtouch
you will need some manual configuration
ok that worked now how do I configuer it please mate?
you will need to edit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
All in the terminal? sorry I'v only just started using the terminal
it will actually be easier in the Terminal, yes
sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
ok im in there
What do I do now? sorry to be a pain
details at http://www.akos.uklinux.net/biblo-linux/
you may also need to add "evdev" to /etc/modules
ctrl-X
you can close when you see the $ prompt again
enter
maybe you originally typed x11 instead of X11
close and start again
from the instal?l
i thought you already had the system installed
i mean "sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf" again
